sentences.en: a central heating system with a radiator in each room
sentences.cn: 每个房间都配有一个散热器的中央供暖系统

sentences.en: Beck's Mercedes, with its large diplomatic medallion on the radiator drove up the wharf and stopped.
sentences.cn: 贝克的梅西德斯轿车的水箱上有个很大的外交标记,车到码头上就停住了.

sentences.en: Bimetal casting radiator combines the advanced technology & elegance design.
sentences.cn: 双金属压铸散热器将先进技术 与 优雅设计紧密结合中.

sentences.en: Fill your radiator with water, or your engine will overheat.
sentences.cn: 给你的散热器充水, 否则引擎会过热.

sentences.en: He drew up his chair near the radiator and lighted the gas.
sentences.cn: 他把椅子挪近取暖炉,点燃了煤气.

sentences.en: Hurstwood sat and read by his radiator in the corner.
sentences.cn: 赫斯渥在屋角的取暖炉边坐着看报.

sentences.en: It still has dingy corridors, ancient washrooms, rusting bunk beds (six to a room), a single fluorescent bulb hanging from the ceiling and an ancient radiator in front of the window.
sentences.cn: 仍旧是昏暗的走廊，老式的厕所，生锈的床铺（六人一间），一只荧光灯泡吊在天花板上，还有一只旧暖气片放在窗前。

sentences.en: My car engine overheated because the water had leaked out of the radiator.
sentences.cn: 我的汽车引擎过热，原因是散热器漏水。

sentences.en: She placed the handkerchief on a piece of paper to dry on the radiator.
sentences.cn: 她把手帕放在一张纸上放到暖气上去烘干.

sentences.en: Sit by the radiator and get warm.
sentences.cn: 坐在暖气旁边,暖和暖和.

sentences.en: Smoke was used to simulate steam coming from a smashed radiator.
sentences.cn: 用烟来模拟从撞碎的散热器中冒出的蒸气。

sentences.en: Someone turned on the radiator in this room while we were out.
sentences.cn: 我们外出时,有人把房内的电炉扭开了.

sentences.en: The heated water is thus cooled as it goes through the radiator.
sentences.cn: 当热水流经散热器时就被冷却了.

sentences.en: The hostage had been shackled to a radiator.
sentences.cn: 当时人质被铐在暖气片上。

sentences.en: The two ends of the pipeline are connected with the radiator.
sentences.cn: 管道的两端与暖气片相连接.

sentences.en: Top up the radiator before making a long journey.
sentences.cn: 在长途旅行前加满散热器.

sentences.en: Wade placed his chilled hands on the radiator and warmed them.
sentences.cn: 韦德把冰凉的双手放在暖气片上取暖。

sentences.en: We bled the car radiator off.
sentences.cn: 我们排放汽车散热器中的气。

sentences.en: When her cellphone rang in class one day, the teacher smashed it against the radiator.
sentences.cn: 有一次在课堂上她的手机响了，老师立马将它摔到了暖气片上。

sentences.en: Why would you put napalm on the radiator?
sentences.cn: 为什么你要把凝固汽油涂在散热器上?

words.tran_cn: 辐射的；容光焕发的；光芒四射的
辐射；光辉；发光；容光焕发
辐射；流露；发光；从中心向各方伸展
辐射；传播；流露；发射；广播
[电]散热器；[建]暖气片；[声][物][核]辐射体

phrases.tran_cn: 催化燃烧；铸铁制散热器
n. 散热器；热辐射器；散热片

trans.tran_cn: 暖气片，散热器，（汽车引擎的）冷却器，辐射体，冰箱
trans.tran_en: a thin metal container that is fastened to a wall and through which hot water passes to provide heat for a room
